title: At the court at Whitehall the nineteenth of December 1684 present the Kings Most Excellent Majesty ... : His Majesty minding to secure all his loving subjects in travelling and going about their lawful occasions ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
